channel.title: Ideas
channel.description: Well, idk where else to post this since there's no suggest board.. I need ideas for my server to be unique, and fun. Please post some ideas that you think would help bring players, and make the server fun. If i get a good suggestion i'm prob going to release it.

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Why would you handle that via command?
The horrible.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Mine isn’t 602+ loading graphics, but I’m gonna make a minigame atm that is similar to Castle Wars, but spawns you at the place where you can get zammy and sara cape. Then, they fight to the death! They cannot hit their teammates and don’t lose items.

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

Ohkay.
ummmm, why don’t you change it to.
Crash island, or Lleyta, or Graveyard? from the minigame.
When I get on my server I’ll post my staffzone coords.
It’s pretty good. like near a waterfall and shit.

If you got really bored, you could make a home for a few select players.
Just make a command that only they can use and it takes them to a house somewhere or w.e

You could make an epic starter?
most servers have starters with like 10m or something.
make yours like full torva and something and it will get people interested.

If you are boss at java.
Incorporate a Roll the dice system.

Eg;
::rtd
“you have won instant kills for 3 mins”
or
::rtd
“you have been stripped of 40m from your bank”
^ I imagine that’d keep you busy for a while.
::rtd
“you have won god mode for 1hr”

idk something like that.
i’m trying to think of more and will repost when i think of something

Read full topic

item.title: Ideas
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:15, topic:411139”]Gambling.
Gambling is always ridiculously fun.

And if you wanna change your home. Just search for the coords in your source folder.
Easiest way :D[/quote]
Lawl, i meant to say i dont know what to change it TO hehe. Gambling has been released and kinda sucks + I already got lottery… Any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.description:

ExtremeX-Scape™:

Like that old bandos minigame just remake it to become better, anyway that skill I made you, how is it?

How does it work IG? I’ll be sure to run my code through you when i’m done

Andrew, got a tutorial or a tip for adding custom maps?

The skill is amazing, but i need to add more stuff until i start advertising…

item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:7, topic:411139”]A custom skill
G.E
Custom maps
Different home
Custom castle wars like minigame
Custom quest for lunar / ancient spells
Quest in order to pk or be able to earn pk points[/quote]
The G.E i’m prob gonna start it…soon.
Custom skill I already got thanks2u.
Diff home- idfk where to change it to >.> can’t think of any places
Custom minigame- There’s tons of custom shitty minigames on other servers, so nothx.
Quests- I already got 1 quest so far, i’m gonna finish it soon.

Read full topic
